header.deadlineTooltip: Vote for your favorite snacks before this date! Vote counts reset after each snack order.

auth.loginDescription: Sign in with your @tryplayground.com email to start voting!

hero.title: What should we snack on?
hero.subtitle: Help us choose the best snacks for the office. Vote for your favorites and see what wins!

addProductModal.title: Add New Product
addProductModal.productNameTooltip: Be as specific as possible! Include brand name, flavor, size, or variety (e.g., 'Califia Farms Almond Milk - Original 48oz' or 'Lay's Classic Potato Chips')
addProductModal.productNamePlaceholder: e.g., Califia Farms Almond Milk - Original 48oz
addProductModal.imageUrlTooltip: Right-click any image on the web and select 'Copy image link' to get the URL
addProductModal.imageErrorHint: Check your URL and try again
addProductModal.imageUrlHint: Enter an image URL to see preview
addProductModal.tagsTooltip: Add descriptive keywords like 'organic', 'gluten-free', 'seasonal', etc. These help with searching and categorizing products.
addProductModal.similarProductsWarning: We found similar products already in the catalog. Are you sure this is a unique item?

validationErrors.priceInvalid: Price must be a valid number
validationErrors.imageLoadError: Please wait for image to load or provide a valid URL

addProductModal.submitError: Failed to add product. Please try again.

czarPanel.title: Snack Czar Panel
czarPanel.setCzarDescription: Set the current snack czar for the
czarPanel.czarResponsibilities:
Snack Czar Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Ordering snacks on the drop date
‚Ä¢ Dealing with disputes over office snacks
‚Ä¢ Keeping snacks stocked
‚Ä¢ Receives PG coin from snack voting as compensation (if enabled)
czarPanel.updateDropDeadline: Update the snack drop deadline date for
czarPanel.czarWillNotReceive: czar will not receive tips from votes.
czarPanel.searchAndDelete: Search for and delete snacks from the catalog.
czarPanel.resetVotesDescription: This action will reset all vote counts to zero and mark the end of the current voting period.
czarPanel.proveNotRobot: Step 1: Prove you're not a robot
czarPanel.snacksOrdered: ‚úì The office snacks have been ordered
czarPanel.snacksMatched: ‚úì The ordered snacks match our list
czarPanel.officeReady: ‚úì The office is prepared for snack delivery
czarPanel.responsibility: üî• I take full responsibility for the snacks!
czarPanel.allRequirementsMet: ‚úì All requirements met - Ready to reset!

purchaseAdModal.title: Purchase Banner Ad
purchaseAdModal.searchPlaceholder: Search products by name, category, or tags...
purchaseAdModal.adTextHelper: Your ad text will appear on the banner
purchaseAdModal.styleTooltip: Select a retro-inspired banner style for your ad

step1.title: Welcome!
step1.description: Welcome to Playground Eats, the place to vote for your favorite office snacks.

step2.title: Vote
step2.description: Use your PG coins to shape office food selection destiny and prevent crimes against snacking. Upvote bangers, downvote everything else.

step3.title: Add Snacks
step3.description: Don't see your favorite snack? Add it to the list! (in the menu once logged in)

step5.title: Enjoy
step5.description: The snacks with the most votes will be ordered for the office.

step4.title: Promote
step4.description: Tired of losing snack votes? Purchase a banner ad to spread propaganda for your favorite snacks. Nothing says "trust me" like aggressive advertising.
